name: Dreaming in Roots
description: In a world where the plants are tempting people into becoming one with them by using their happiest memories. In this world a young boy must rescue his family after they decided to go back to their roots inside the plants. He must search for keys in the wardroves of his and their neighbours houses to open the doors and keep advancing until he discovers what has happened to his family Controls (keyboard and mouse): Right click to move camera WASD to move E to interact / cancel interaction Controls (controller): Left stick to move Right Stick to aim Circle / B to interact / cancel interaction
